bibl.title: Proceedings of the Twelfth International Congress of Papyrology.
bibl.seg: Samuel (Samuel Hobson) Deborah (Ed.), Proceedings of the Twelfth International Congress of Papyrology. (American Studies in Papyrology. 7.)
Toronto, A.M. Hakkert, 1970, 4°, xvi-551 pp., figg. et planches.

C.R. par Sebastian Bartina, StPap 11 (1972) pp. 64-66. - Hans Georg Gundel, HZ 215 (1972) pp. 117-119. - Marcel Hombert, ChrEg 46 (1971) No. 92, pp. 400-410. - Joseph Modrzejewski, Iura 21 (1970) pp. 316-330. - Peter J. Parsons, JEA 59 (1973) pp. 272-273. - Günter Poethke, DLZ 94 (1973) coll. 116-118. - Idem, ArchPF 22-23 (1974) pp. 309-314. - Tony Reekmans, BibO 30 (1973) pp. 238-240. - Ewa Wipszycka, JJurP 18 (1974) pp. 318-331.
